resources.string: This hostname is not valid, please check your written name.
Please give me a valid port.

string.name: help_text1
string.li: To connect to a server you have to fill in the host name and port you want to connect to, then press connect.

string.name: help_text2
string.li: If the connection was successful, you will be asked to choose a key file from your directory.

string.name: help_text3
string.li: If you choose an authorized key file, you will be directed to the stream viewer.

string.name: help_text4
string.li: You can view the servers you already connected with in options and modify or delete them with a long touch.

string.name: help_text5
string.li: You can get back to the main screen at any time by using the Back button.
